text: nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/canary: "true" YAML RGIME i ingress.kubernetes.io/canary-weight: {{ .Values.canaryWeight }} name: ingress-stable name: ingress-canary service: service: name: stable-sve name: canary-svc helm upgrade --install myrelease --set canaryWeight=10 --set stablelmage.tag=1.0.0 --set canarylmage.tag=v2.0.0 myrepo/mychart YAML YAML name: stable-svc name: canary-svc YAMI YAMI image: # stable image name and tag image: # canary image name and tag
